3. Calculate the limit of the following expression: $$\lim_{x \to 0} \frac{\log{\left(x + 1 \right)}}{x}$$

4. Calculate the limit of the following expression: $$\lim_{x \to 0} 4 x^{3} - 5 x^{2} - x - 1$$

9. Calculate the limit of the following expression: $$\lim_{x \to -3} 5 x^{3} - x^{2} + x - 5$$

10. Calculate the limit of the following expression: $$\lim_{x \to 0} \frac{\log{\left(x + 1 \right)}}{x}$$
